Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.27862650]Gram-positive bacteria :Mycobacteria smegmatis mc2 155 (MIC=15 μg/ml), Bacillus subtilis DELTA (MIC=40 μg/ml);Gram-negative bacteria :Escherichia coli DH5a (MIC=400 μg/ml), Zymomonas mobilis 10988 (MIC=10 μg/ml);Fungi :Candida parapsilosis (MIC=30 μg/ml)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.27862650]0% hemolysis at 100 μg/ml , 4% hemolysis at 200 μg/ml , 11% hemolysis at 300 μg/ml , 13% hemolysis at 400 μg/ml , 15% hemolysis at 500 μg/ml against human red blood cells
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive bacteria and Gram-negative bacteria, Antifungal activity agaist Candida parapsilosis

Literature.Title: Synthesis and biological activity of lipophilic analogs of the cationic antimicrobial active peptide anoplin
Literature.Author: Kostas Chionis, Dimitrios Krikorian, Anna-Irini Koukkou, Maria Sakarellos-Daitsiotis and Eugenia Panou-Pomonis
